name: qrgenerator
description: QrGenerator is a modern web application built with the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) that allows users to generate customized QR codes with different shapes, colors, and styles. It provides an intuitive interface and a powerful backend API for managing QR code generation and storage.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
